attributes.action: The Knighting of Mr Nigel Farage for his services to Europe, Peace and Democracy
attributes.background: Mr Nigel Farage has campaigned for Britain's withdrawal from the EU, He has fulfilled his duty to his country and it is only right that he be fittingly honoured for his contribution to his nation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
